Partial Mouse Control.tooltip: allows scrolling by hovering near edge of map; conflicts with isometric view; may cause trouble with macros

Extra Misc. Tweaks.tooltip: TWBT Multilevel, among other misc. settings and keybinds

Automatic Job Assignments.tooltip: the 'autolabor' plugin automates job assignments, replacing tools such as Dwarf Therapist

Other Automation plugins.command: multicmd autonestbox start; repeat -time 7 -timeUnits days -command [ burial ] -name burial

Workflow - production targets.tooltip: the 'workflow' plugin disables cancelling repeat jobs.  Use 'alt-W' to set targets (eg 'if less than 100 drinks, unsuspend drink production until 200 drinks').  Great for automating complicated industries.

Performance Tweaks.command: multicmd tweak fast-heat 100; repeat -time 1 -timeUnits months -command [ cleanowned X ] -name cleanowned; repeat -time 1 -timeUnits months -command [ clean all ] -name clean
Performance Tweaks.tooltip: dfhack fixes to run regularly, changes the game a little but helps a lot on old or slow hardware (fast-heat, dump worn items, remove all contaminants)

Stonesense Isometric view.tooltip:
Opens an isometric visualiser in a separate window.
 Run in-game with 'ssense overlay', but ONLY in PRINT_MODE:2D (crashes otherwise)

Disable Manager Quantity Limit.tooltip: Allows setting more than 30 items to be producted at a time from the manager screen

Pure Bugfixes.command: multicmd fix/blood-del enable; repeat -time 1 -timeUnits months -command [ fix/feeding-timers ] -name feeding-timers; repeat -time 1 -timeUnits months -command [ fix/stuckdoors ] -name stuckdoors
Pure Bugfixes.tooltip: bugfixes to run regularly, strongly recomended (fix: feeding prisoners, stuckdoors)
